sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../../App.css'; export default function CartItem({item, value}) { const {id, title, img, size, price, total, count} = item; const {increment, decrement, removeItem} = value; return (
{title}
{size}
decrement(id)}>-
{count}
increment(id)}>+
{price}
removeItem(id)}>x
) }
